```{r, echo = TRUE}
data(iris)
head(iris)
```

```{r, eval = FALSE}
group_by(iris, Species) %>%
  summarise_each(funs(mean), Sepal.Length, Sepal.Width) %>%
  as.data.frame() %>%
  xtable() %>%
  print(include.rownames = F)
```
